title: Megan McKenna looks chic in colourful striped blouse as she collects a dress
text:
She was recently confirmed as one of the 15 acts set to take part in The X Factor: Celebrity.

And Megan McKenna looked excited as she picked up a dress in Mayfair just nine days before the show's debut on Thursday.

The former TOWIE star, 27, nailed casual chic in a multi-coloured striped blouse with a high-neck as she carried a white dress bag out of a boutique - which could contain a dress for her live performance on the show.

Glamour: Megan McKenna looked excited as she picked up a dress in Mayfair just nine days before the show's debut on Thursday

Megan drew the eye to her lean legs in black flares and boosted her height with black ankle boots.

Her platinum locks were styled sleek and straight while her pretty features were enhanced with a rich palette of make-up.

She completed her ensemble with a jaunty Baker Boy cap as she made a jovial exit from the store.

Megan's cheerful display comes days after she was finally confirmed as one of the famous faces set to take part in The X Factor: Celebrity.

Delight: The former TOWIE star, 27, nailed casual chic in a multi-coloured striped blouse with a high-neck as she carried a white dress bag out of a boutique - which could contain a dress for her live performance on the show

Chic: Megan drew the eye to her lean legs in black flares and boosted her height with black ankle boots

Delight: Megan looked pretty pleased with her purchase as she made her way out of the store

The beauty will join the likes of Ben Foden, Ricki Lake, Wes Nelson and Brendan Cole in the singing competition.

The acts will battle it out to impress judges Simon Cowell, Louis Walsh and Nicole Scherzinger.

The new look series is likely to be followed by another X Factor spin-off, X Factor All Stars, which see former faces from previous series' return to take on each other.

Speaking about his new X Factor shows, Simon Cowell told The Sun: The time feels right, and it will be a huge change.

‘We haven’t exactly confirmed the dates or the order of the shows, but essentially there are going to be two versions of X Factor running this year. I think it’s going to be huge, it’s the best I’ve felt about this show in ages.'

Style star: Megan showed off her sartorial prowess as she perused the store
description: Megan McKenna looked excited as she picked up a dress in Mayfair just nine days before the show's debut on Thursday.
